ShaderNodePreset.Description:
Reflects an IBL map to match latlong environment map reflections from other software
lewis@lewissaunders.com
ShaderNodePreset.Name: LatlongIBL

Uniform.Tooltip: Use correct mapping from reflection direction to position in latlong environment map, which is slightly different to what the IBL node does in cylindrical mode
Uniform.Name: adskUID_correct

Uniform.Tooltip: Mipmap LOD offset, crudely but quickly blurs the map
Uniform.Name: adskUID_lod

Uniform.Tooltip: Use this IBL map number if multiple IBL nodes in scene
Uniform.Name: adskUID_iblidx
